   20: %%
   21: 
   22: -module(lasp_peer_to_peer_advertisement_counter_SUITE).
   23: -author("Christopher Meiklejohn <christopher.meiklejohn@gmail.com>").
   24: 
   25: %% common_test callbacks
   26: -export([%% suite/0,
   27:          init_per_suite/1,
   28:          end_per_suite/1,
   29:          init_per_testcase/2,
   30:          end_per_testcase/2,
   31:          all/0]).
   32: 
   33: %% tests
   34: -compile([export_all]).
   35: 
   36: -include("lasp.hrl").
   37: 
   38: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   39: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
   40: -include_lib("kernel/include/inet.hrl").
   41: 
   42: %% ===================================================================
   43: %% common_test callbacks
   44: %% ===================================================================
   45: 
   46: init_per_suite(_Config) ->
   47:     _Config.
   48: 
   49: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   50:     _Config.
   51: 
   52: init_per_testcase(Case, _Config) ->
   53:     ct:pal("Beginning test case ~p", [Case]),
   54: 
   55:     _Config.
   56: 
   57: end_per_testcase(Case, _Config) ->
   58:     ct:pal("Ending test case ~p", [Case]),
   59: 
   60:     _Config.
   61: 
   62: all() ->
   63:     [
   64:      heavy_peer_to_peer_state_based_test,
   65:      full_peer_to_peer_state_based_tree_test,
   66:      peer_to_peer_state_based_test,
   67:      peer_to_peer_state_based_tree_test,
   68:      peer_to_peer_delta_based_test%%,
   69:      %%peer_to_peer_state_based_ps_test,
   70:      %%peer_to_peer_state_based_ps_tree_test,
   71:      %%peer_to_peer_delta_based_ps_test
   72:     ].
   73: 
   74: %% ===================================================================
   75: %% tests
   76: %% ===================================================================
   77: 
   78: default_test(_Config) ->
   79:     ok.
   80: 
   81: %% ===================================================================
   82: %% peer-to-peer
   83: %% ===================================================================
   84: 
   85: heavy_peer_to_peer_state_based_test(Config) ->
   86:     lasp_simulation_support:run(peer_to_peer_ad_counter_state_based_test,
   87:         Config,
   88:         [{mode, state_based},
   89:          {simulation, ad_counter},
   90:          {partisan_peer_service_manager, partisan_hyparview_peer_service_manager},
   91:          {set, orset},
   92:          {heavy_client, true},
   93:          {broadcast, false},
   94:          {evaluation_identifier, peer_to_peer_state_based}]),
   95:     ok.
   96: 
   97: full_peer_to_peer_state_based_tree_test(Config) ->
   98:     lasp_simulation_support:run(peer_to_peer_ad_counter_state_based_tree_test,
   99:         Config,
  100:         [{mode, state_based},
  101:          {simulation, ad_counter},
  102:          {partisan_peer_service_manager, partisan_default_peer_service_manager},
  103:          {set, orset},
  104:          {broadcast, true},
  105:          {evaluation_identifier, full_peer_to_peer_state_based_tree}]),
  106:     ok.
  107: 
  108: peer_to_peer_state_based_test(Config) ->
  109:     lasp_simulation_support:run(peer_to_peer_ad_counter_state_based_test,
  110:         Config,
  111:         [{mode, state_based},
  112:          {simulation, ad_counter},
  113:          {partisan_peer_service_manager, partisan_hyparview_peer_service_manager},
  114:          {set, orset},
  115:          {broadcast, false},
  116:          {evaluation_identifier, peer_to_peer_state_based}]),
  117:     ok.
  118: 
  119: peer_to_peer_state_based_tree_test(Config) ->
  120:     lasp_simulation_support:run(peer_to_peer_ad_counter_state_based_tree_test,
  121:         Config,
  122:         [{mode, state_based},
  123:          {simulation, ad_counter},
  124:          {partisan_peer_service_manager, partisan_hyparview_peer_service_manager},
  125:          {set, orset},
  126:          {broadcast, true},
  127:          {evaluation_identifier, peer_to_peer_state_based_tree}]),
  128:     ok.
  129: 
  130: peer_to_peer_delta_based_test(Config) ->
  131:     lasp_simulation_support:run(peer_to_peer_ad_counter_delta_based_test,
  132:         Config,
  133:         [{mode, delta_based},
  134:          {simulation, ad_counter},
  135:          {partisan_peer_service_manager, partisan_hyparview_peer_service_manager},
  136:          {set, orset},
  137:          {broadcast, false},
  138:          {evaluation_identifier, peer_to_peer_delta_based}]),
  139:     ok.
  140: 
  141: peer_to_peer_state_based_ps_test(Config) ->
  142:     lasp_simulation_support:run(peer_to_peer_ad_counter_state_based_ps_test,
  143:         Config,
  144:         [{mode, state_based},
  145:          {simulation, ad_counter},
  146:          {partisan_peer_service_manager, partisan_hyparview_peer_service_manager},
  147:          {set, awset_ps},
  148:          {broadcast, false},
  149:          {evaluation_identifier, peer_to_peer_state_based_ps}]),
  150:     ok.
  151: 
  152: peer_to_peer_state_based_ps_tree_test(Config) ->
  153:     lasp_simulation_support:run(peer_to_peer_ad_counter_state_based_ps_tree_test,
  154:         Config,
  155:         [{mode, state_based},
  156:          {simulation, ad_counter},
  157:          {partisan_peer_service_manager, partisan_hyparview_peer_service_manager},
  158:          {set, awset_ps},
  159:          {broadcast, true},
  160:          {evaluation_identifier, peer_to_peer_state_based_ps_tree}]),
  161:     ok.
  162: 
  163: peer_to_peer_delta_based_ps_test(Config) ->
  164:     lasp_simulation_support:run(peer_to_peer_ad_counter_delta_based_ps_test,
  165:         Config,
  166:         [{mode, delta_based},
  167:          {simulation, ad_counter},
  168:          {partisan_peer_service_manager, partisan_hyparview_peer_service_manager},
  169:          {set, awset_ps},
  170:          {broadcast, false},
  171:          {evaluation_identifier, peer_to_peer_delta_based_ps}]),
  172:     ok.
